channel.title: Abouts on Harshavardhan Kadiyala
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Harshavardhan Kadiyala

item.description: About Me Hello , I am a research masters student in Computer engineering department of The University of British Columbia, Vancouver, Canada. I work as a research assistant in The Reliable, Secure, and Sustainable Software Lab with Dr Julia Rubin on topics like Distributed systems, Cloud-native architectures(Microservices) and Android kernel. Before coming to UBC, I worked on Distributed embedded systems with Siemens in there advanced therapies division and with Flash Translation layer team at SanDisk.
